actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the confidentiality of medical and/or dental records of patients not receiving assistance from the Federal Government.

summary.text: Prohibits the inspection or acquisition by an agent of the United States of medical and dental records of patients who are not under a federally- assisted program. Sets forth the procedure by which a patient may authorize the disclosure of such records. Establishes criminal penalties for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the confidentiality of medical and/or dental records of patients not receiving assistance from the Federal Government.
